Meet the team

Our directors has outstanding knowledge of the maritime industry and a track record of success in it. With their skills and experience, they are well equipped to drive the company forward.

Kent Lee

Chief Executive Officer

Kent is a visionary technology and business executive who has a keen eye for emerging business trends. Prior to joining Voyager Worldwide, he was the Chief Executive Officer of Dimension Data (now known as NTT Ltd) in Singapore, a subsidiary of the NTT Group of Japan.

Learn More

Taka Yamazumi

Chief Financial Officer

Taka is responsible for the overall financial well-being of the company, enabling the business with the timely provision of financial reports to support decision-making and ensuring that we meet all regulatory requirements in countries that we operate in.

Learn More

Simon Harrison

Director of Customer Success

Simon has nearly 20 years international experience in the maritime industry, including extensive leadership experience in Customer Service and trade management functions.

Learn More

Hayley Van Leeuwen

Director of Product Management and Marketing

Hayley has been with the business since 2012. In her current role as Director of Product Mangement and Marketing, Hayley is responsible for our product portfolio and marketing communications worldwide.

Learn More

Barrie Wilson

Innovation & Solutions Director

In his role as Innovation & Solutions Director, Barrie is responsible for managing the successful delivery of software products and web based solutions, while defining the strategy for the product development team by driving initiatives that deliver the product vision.

Learn More

David Addy

IT Director & CISO

As IT Director and CISO at Voyager Worldwide, David looks after the infrastructure of all our technical operations. With more than 20 years in the maritime sector, Dave has considerable experience of change management, system integration and IT operations.

Learn More

Kieron Abernethy

General Manager, EMEA

Kieron holds full P&L responsibility for the EMEA region. Kieron has more than 30 years experience in sales leadership, operations and senior management roles in a wide range of technology business sectors.

Learn More

Harpreet Mavi

General Manager, APAC & Americas

Harpreet began his career with Safe Navigation, Inc. in Long Beach, California. He has seventeen years of experience with nine years as the General Manager at Safe Navigation.

Learn More

Moriyasu Saito

General Manager, Japan and Korea

Having started his career as a navigating officer, Saito joined the Cornes Group in 2005. He was appointed COO of the Cornes Charting Division in Japan in 2020.

Learn More

Kent Lee

IT Director & CISO

Kent is a visionary technology and business executive who has a keen eye for emerging business trends and technologies. Prior to joining Voyager Worldwide, he was the Chief Executive Officer of Dimension Data (now known as NTT Ltd) in Singapore, a subsidiary of the NTT Group of Japan. His other career highlights included the co-founding of CloudRaidgm, a start-up focused on the R&D of an AI engine for business analytics and the development of associated SaaS applications, and had also held various senior management positions in Jardine OneSolution (the IT business of the Jardine Matheson group) with his last role being Chief Operating Officer based in Singapore, and was also responsible for defining the strategic direction of new technologies adoption and business initiatives for the group in Asia.

Kent holds a Master of Science (Finance) with Honours, from the National University of Ireland, Dublin and has over 15 years of senior leadership experience in General Management, Innovation and Technology Management, Sales, Business Transformation and Change Management in the IT industry.
